title: Ambient Video Game Music - Dino Kingdom 2
description: Welcome to the anticipated follow-up to our popular dinosaur-infested forest ambience tracks.
longDescription:
Welcome to the anticipated follow-up to our popular dinosaur-infested forest ambience tracks. This new collection of 10 packs deepens the auditory journey into the prehistoric wild, providing game developers with an even richer array of sounds to immerse players into a world dominated by the magnificent, awe-inspiring dinosaurs.


In this sequel, the haunting calls of the dinosaurs reverberate with even greater realism. Each pack features the sounds of these magnificent creatures, now further diversified to reflect the broad spectrum of dinosaur species. From the ground-shaking bellow of long-necked herbivores to the predatory shriek of a velociraptor, the authenticity of these sounds heightens the immersive experience, reminding players of the lurking presence of these ancient beasts.


Adding to the underlying tension of these packs are the amplified sounds of prehistoric birds fluttering in the lush forest canopy. Their distinct calls, rich in variety, are designed to emulate the lively chatter of these ancient avians, creating a dense sonic texture that echoes the vibrant life of a prehistoric forest.


Uniting these elements is a seamlessly integrated track, a follow-up to its predecessor, but with a heightened sense of drama. The soundtrack mirrors the primal energy and unpredictability of the dinosaur-infested wilderness, perfectly blending with the natural sounds of the forest to create a unified, immersive audio experience.


Ideal for game developers seeking to further enhance their prehistoric-themed environments, this sequel offers a more comprehensive and vivid sonic depiction of the age of the dinosaurs. The sounds in this collection not only immerse players in the heart of a dinosaur-driven adventure but also make them feel as if they're stepping back in time, experiencing firsthand the thrill and awe of the world's most magnificent creatures.


This pack contains 10 tracks that are each 3 minutes long for a total 30 minutes of audio


--

Do you want to add an extra layer of immersion to your games?


Then check out our ambient video game music collections! These soundtracks will help transport you to different worlds, alien planets, frozen tundra's, Japan & hundreds of other scenarios and locations, adding an extra level of realism and excitement to your gameplay. Whether you are a game developer looking for high-quality sounds to use in your new games or breath life into some existing projects, our music collections are perfect for you!


--


We also have a number of other music collections and bundles available for sale at our publisher page, click here to check out our catalogue.
